name: AFTERLIFE
description: this artwork of mine describes that death is inevitable. but, death in its own way is beautiful. for one to experience death has to pay the hefty price of his soul. but you shall also be rewarded with the gift of afterlife to experience the beauty of life again. but death in its own way is both a bliss and a pain. a bliss to your soul and a pain to your loved ones. . .   the pain of losing a near one is unrepairable. .
